title: Accidental shooting victim dies in the hospital
content:
CORPUS CHRISTI -
An 18-year-old man who police say accidentally shot himself has died.
The shooting happened in the garage of a home in the 6300 block of Hanley Drive on March 1.
Police said the man was driven to the hospital by a friend after he accidentally shot himself in the stomach.
The friend reportedly told officers that the victim was showing him a handgun when it fired.
At the time of the incident detectives had not been able to speak to the victim to confirm the story due to his injuries, but said they did not suspect foul play
On Sunday, detectives learned that the man passed away. We're told the investigation is ongoing.
